verses.text: The vision of Obadiah.
parts: The vision of Obadiah.

verses.text: Behold, I have made you least among the nations; you are greatly dishonored.
parts: Behold, I have made you least among the nations; you are greatly dishonored.

verses.text: The arrogance of your heart exalts you, dwelling as you do in the clefts of the rocks, as one overconfident in his habitation, saying in his heart, ‘Who will bring me down to the ground?’
parts: The arrogance of your heart exalts you, dwelling as you do in the clefts of the rocks, as one overconfident in his habitation, saying in his heart, ‘Who will bring me down to the ground?’

verses.text: If you should ascend as the eagle, and if you should make your nest amongst the stars, from there I shall bring you down,” says the Lord.
parts: If you should ascend as the eagle, and if you should make your nest amongst the stars, from there I shall bring you down,” says the Lord.

verses.text: “If thieves come upon you or robbers by night, then to what place will you escape?
parts: “If thieves come upon you or robbers by night, then to what place will you escape?

verses.text: How Esau has been searched out, and his hidden things seized!
parts: How Esau has been searched out, and his hidden things seized!

verses.text: All your allies force you to your borders.
parts: All your allies force you to your borders.

verses.text: “In that day,” says the Lord, “I shall destroy the wise men from Edom and understanding from the mountain of Esau. And your warriors from Teman will be terrified, in order that everyone from the mountain of Esau may be cut off.
parts: “In that day,” says the Lord, “I shall destroy the wise men from Edom and understanding from the mountain of Esau.
And your warriors from Teman will be terrified, in order that everyone from the mountain of Esau may be cut off.

verses.text: And your warriors from Teman will be terrified, in order that everyone from the mountain of Esau may be cut off.
parts: And your warriors from Teman will be terrified, in order that everyone from the mountain of Esau may be cut off.

verses.text: Because of the slaughter and ungodliness against your brother Jacob, shame shall cover you, and you will be cut off forever.
parts: Because of the slaughter and ungodliness against your brother Jacob, shame shall cover you, and you will be cut off forever.

verses.text: Because of that day in which you stood back and only watched the capture, his forces being led away as captives by foreigners; in the day when they entered his gates and cast lots for Jerusalem—on that day you were as one of them.
parts: Because of that day in which you stood back and only watched the capture, his forces being led away as captives by foreigners; in the day when they entered his gates and cast lots for Jerusalem—on that day you were as one of them.

verses.text: And you should not have looked on the day of your brother, on the day of foreigners, and you should not have rejoiced against the children of Judah in the day of their destruction, nor spoken boastfully on the day of distress.
parts: And you should not have looked on the day of your brother, on the day of foreigners, and you should not have rejoiced against the children of Judah in the day of their destruction, nor spoken boastfully on the day of distress.

verses.text: Neither should you have gone into the gates of the people on the day of their suffering.
parts: Neither should you have gone into the gates of the people on the day of their suffering.

verses.text: Nor should you have stood at their mountain passes to put to death those escaping; nor should you have taken prisoner those fleeing from them in the day of trial.
parts: Nor should you have stood at their mountain passes to put to death those escaping; nor should you have taken prisoner those fleeing from them in the day of trial.

verses.text: “For the day of the Lord is near against all the nations.
parts: “For the day of the Lord is near against all the nations.

verses.text: For in the same way that you drank on My holy mountain, so too shall all the nations drink wine.
parts: For in the same way that you drank on My holy mountain, so too shall all the nations drink wine.

verses.text: “But deliverance will come to Mount Zion, and it will be holy.
parts: “But deliverance will come to Mount Zion, and it will be holy.

verses.text: And the house of Jacob shall be the fire, and the house of Joseph the flame; but the house of Esau shall be the stubble and will be devoured in flames, and no one of the house of Esau will survive,” for the Lord has spoken.
parts: And the house of Jacob shall be the fire, and the house of Joseph the flame; but the house of Esau shall be the stubble and will be devoured in flames, and no one of the house of Esau will survive,” for the Lord has spoken.

verses.text: And those who dwell in the Negev shall inherit the mountain of Esau, and those of the Sephelah the land of the Philistines.
parts: And those who dwell in the Negev shall inherit the mountain of Esau, and those of the Sephelah the land of the Philistines.

verses.text: For the captivity of the sons of Israel shall possess the land of the Canaanite as far as Zarephath; the captivity of Jerusalem as far as Ephratha shall possess the cities of the Negev.
parts: For the captivity of the sons of Israel shall possess the land of the Canaanite as far as Zarephath; the captivity of Jerusalem as far as Ephratha shall possess the cities of the Negev.

verses.text: And those who have been rescued shall ascend from Mount Zion to exact vengeance on the mountain of Esau, and the kingdom shall be the Lord's.
parts: And those who have been rescued shall ascend from Mount Zion to exact vengeance on the mountain of Esau, and the kingdom shall be the Lord's.
